translated: Dino Buzzati is a writer, journalist, art critic, painter and Italian designer born October 16, 1906 in Belluno (northeast Italy) and died January 28, 1972 in Milan.
original: Dino Buzzati est un écrivain, journaliste, critique d'art, peintre et dessinateur italien né le 16 octobre 1906 à Belluno (nord-est de l'Italie) et mort le 28 janvier 1972 à Milan.
